Articles.Content:
Seems there is some sort of trickery going on here. Either somehow Moho became un-tidally locked, or my ships have an interesting ability to teleport. Originally, I landed right in the middle of the backside of Moho,and after a few kerbal months, it seems my lander is right in between the two sides now:

Anyone else experience this sort of black magic?

Moho hasn't been tidally locked since version 0.17. (That is, they unlocked it in 0.18 when they changed all sorts of other things about it, like changing its mass and remove its atmosphere.)

Edit: Ha! I win!

http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Moho : "As of 0.18, it is no longer tidally locked to Kerbol."

Edit: ninja-ed

Um it became un tidally locked in 0.18....

Edit: Ninja'D
Ohh... Now I feel stupid haha, I even sat there and timewarped, still thinking it was tidally locked, but it must of been because of my position
